statements: DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 100 AND age > 50
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND disease_diagnosis = 'Diabetes'
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE age < 30 AND (gender = 'Female' OR treatment_plan LIKE '%Surgery%')
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 1 AND cost > 1000
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND diagnosis = 'Cancer'
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM treatments WHERE duration_days > 30)
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 60 AND diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%';
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date < '2022-01-01' AND appointment_time < '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Diseases WHERE severity = 'High' OR affected_organ = 'Heart';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE description LIKE '%pain%' OR effectiveness_rating <= 3;
